info.title: Twitter Express API with Swagger
info.description: This is a Social media API made with Express and documented with Swagger

email.description: The email of the user (must be unique).

emailVerificationToken.description: token send to email to verify it.

200.description: User created successfully. the token is returned in a cookie named `token`.

400.description: Bad Request - Email or username is already in the database.

example: there is a user in database with same email or username

401.description: verification token is invalid or expired

404.description: Not found - no email verification exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

post.summary: Send an email verification to a user

email.description: The email of the user (must be unique).

400.description: Bad Request - Email is already in the database.

enum: Email is already exists and verified

429.description: More than one request in less than 30 seconds

enum: More than one request in less than 30 seconds

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

post.summary: Send an email to a user with token and url to reset password

UUID.description: unique user identifer it could an email or username or phone.

example.message: email or phone or username is required field

404.description: Not found - no user exist with (username | email | phone).

429.description: More than one request in less than 30 seconds

enum: More than one request in less than 30 seconds

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

post.summary: reset user password to new password if the token is valid

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description: unique user identifer it could an email or username or phone.

200.description: Password Reset successfully. the token is returned in a cookie named `token`.

401.description: token is invalid or expired or when user don't have reset token

enum: User does not have reset token

example.message: password must contain at least 1 number

404.description: Not found - no user exist with (username | email | phone).

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

post.summary: login the user(return user basic information and create a token for the user).

UUID.description: unique user identifer it could an email or username or phone.

200.description:
user logged in successfully.
 the token is returned in a cookie named `token`.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

post.summary: logout the user(delete the token of the user).

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

parameters.name: toID
